Text:
Thank you!!

By "official", do you mean the podcast?
Nicodemus... see my response to your comment on my upload on the 20th!
Awesome to have the 4th hr available...Thanks!!!!

Arvsventure: The website does not actually provide a "podcast" in the traditional sense.  While I think they did at one point in the past, and with gbtv.com up and running they may move to a podcast in the future, the only official release are mp3 files downloadable from the website. I wish they did a "podcast". What I mean by "official" is that these are not rips, but the mp3s provided by glennbeck.com
